title: UnsealedSurfaceFramework
description: Unsealed structural model representations associated to geometric elements such as faults, horizons, and intrusions on a scale of meters to kilometers.

InterpretationID.title: ID of the interpretation
InterpretationID.description: The reference to the StructuralOrganizationInterpretation this framework belongs to.

GenericRepresentationIDs.title: Generic Representation IDs
GenericRepresentationIDs.description: List of Generic Representations linked to structural model inputs and outputs, for example fault sticks and triangulated surfaces, Horizon data points and triangulated surfaces, geobody boundary triangulated surfaces.

SeismicHorizonIDs.title: Seismic Horizon IDs
SeismicHorizonIDs.description: List of SeismicHorizons part of structural model inputs.

SeismicFaultIDs.title: Seismic Fault IDs
SeismicFaultIDs.description: List of individual SeismicFault representations contributing to this structural model. Alternatively FaultSystem can be used as single coherent set of fault representation. Only one property is expected to be populated, either SeismicFaultIDs or FaultSystem.

FaultSystemID.title: Fault System ID
FaultSystemID.description: An alternative, coherent set of fault representations under one work-product-component. Only one property is expected to be populated, either FaultSystem or SeismicFaultIDs.

MarkerSetCollectionID.title: Marker Set Collection ID
MarkerSetCollectionID.description: List of marker set where horizon, fault and geo-boundary markers from different wellbores (potentially the result of a query) are used as input for the structural model.
